titleStmt.title: A letter from the King of Morocco to His Majesty the King of England, Charles I for the reducing of Sally, Argiers &c., the first of which was taken by the assistance of the English forces, with an account of the execution of the pyrats and the number of Christian captives sent to His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Ismāʻīl, Sultan of Morocco, d. 1727.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
